forecast.day_comments: Partly cloudy, with a steady temperature around 25. South wind around 7 mph.
forecast.night_comments: A 20 percent chance of snow after 11am.  Partly sunny, with a high near 36. South wind 7 to 11 mph becoming west northwest in the afternoon.

forecast.day_comments: A 50 percent chance of snow, mainly between 11am and 5pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. South wind 7 to 9 mph becoming west northwest in the afternoon.  Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
